nodes.text: The Space Gamer Magazine was a digest quarterly magazine devoted to science fiction and fantasy board games and roleplaying games. The magazine was a big influence during the 1970s and 1980s. The magazine is no longer published, however the rights holders maintain a web presence using its final title Space Gamer/Fantasy Gamer.
Throughout the magazine's life, many articles were produced detailing the Star Wars Roleplaying Game including new adventures and characters.
